mapper.select:
select j.fid, fmaterial, fexternal_diameter, fwall_thickness, fnextExternal_diameter,fnext_material nextmaterial , fnextwall_thickness from tb_welded_junction j INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = j.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or ins.fparent=#{parent})
and ${str}
group by fmaterial, fexternal_diameter, fwall_thickness, fnextExternal_diameter,fnext_material,fnextwall_thickness

select * from (select sum(falarmtime) as overproof,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime )
weldtime ,insf.fname,insf.fid from tb_alarm l inner join tb_welded_junction j on j.fwelded_junction_no=l.fjunction_id inner join tb_insframework i on l.fitemid = i.fid inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent inner join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by fid,weldtime )temp

select * from (select sum(falarmtime) as overproof,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldtime ,i.fname,i.fid from tb_alarm l inner join tb_welded_junction j on j.fwelded_junction_no=l.fjunction_id inner join tb_insframework i on l.fitemid = i.fid inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent where 1=1
AND (i.fparent = #{parent} or ins.fparent = #{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by fid,weldtime )temp

select weldTime from ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime FROM tb_work WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime UNION SELECT
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime FROM tb_standby WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime )temp order by weldTime

SELECT i.fid,i.fname from tb_insframework i inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent inner join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where i.ftype=#{type}
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fparent = #{parent} or i.fparent=#{parent})

select * from ( select sum(num) overtime,fid,fname,weldTime from ( select case when SUM(fstandbytime)/60 >= #{num} then 1 else 0 end as num,insf.fid,insf.fname,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime from tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent INNER JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by fmachine_id ,weldTime ) A group by fid ,weldTime )temp

select * from ( select sum(num) overtime,fid,fname,weldTime from ( select case when SUM(fstandbytime)/60 >= #{num} then 1 else 0 end as num,i.fid,i.fname,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime from tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND (i.fparent = #{parent} or ins.fparent = #{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by fmachine_id ,weldTime ) A group by fid ,weldTime )temp

select * from ( select sum(num) overtime,fid,fname,weldTime from ( select case when SUM(fstandbytime)/60 >= #{num} then 1 else 0 end as num,i.fid,i.fname,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime from tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND (i.fid = #{dto.parent} or i.fparent = #{dto.parent} or ins.fparent = #{dto.parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by fmachine_id ,weldTime ) A group by fid ,weldTime )temp

SELECT j.fid,fwelded_junction_no fname,fitemid itemid FROM tb_welded_junction j inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.fitemId inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or ins.fparent=#{parent})

select * from ( SELECT
sum(fworktime) / ( 12 *30 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 30 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 7 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, weekofyear(fstarttime)
AS weldTime,insf.fid iid, insf.fname FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fitemid = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent INNER JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
AND fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY iid, weldTime ) temp

select * from ( select
sum(fworktime) / ( 12 *30 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 30 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
sum(fworktime) / ( 7 *8 *60 *60 ) AS loads, weekofyear(fstarttime)
AS weldTime,i.fid iid, i.fname from tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fitemid = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND (i.fparent = #{parent} or ins.fparent = #{parent})
AND fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
AND fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY iid, weldTime )temp

SELECT m.fid,fequipment_no fname,finsframework_id itemid FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on m.finsframework_id = i.fid inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} or i.fparent = #{parent} or ins.fparent = #{parent})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(fstandbytime) AS loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime, insf.fname, insf.fid iid FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fitemId = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent INNER JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY iid, weldTime )temp

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(fstandbytime) AS loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime, i.fname, i.fid iid FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fitemId = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND (i.fparent = #{parent} or ins.fparent = #{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY iid, weldTime )temp

SELECT * FROM( SELECT count(mid) num,weldTime,fname,fid from( SELECT m.fid mid,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime ,insf.fname,insf.fid FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent INNER JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no UNION SELECT m.fid mid,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime ,insf.fname,insf.fid FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent INNER JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no )k group by weldTime,fid ) TEMP

SELECT * FROM( SELECT count(mid) num,weldTime,fname,fid from( SELECT m.fid mid,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime ,ins.fname,ins.fid FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} OR ins.fid = #{parent} OR ins.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no UNION SELECT m.fid mid,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime ,ins.fname,ins.fid FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid = #{parent} OR ins.fid = #{parent} OR ins.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no )k group by weldTime,fid ) TEMP

SELECT * FROM( SELECT count(mid) num,weldTime,fname,fid from( SELECT m.fid mid,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime ,i.fname,i.fid FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fparent=#{parent} or ins.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no UNION SELECT m.fid mid,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime ,i.fname,i.fid FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fparent=#{parent} or ins.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no )k group by weldTime,fid ) TEMP

SELECT count(w.fid) from tb_welding_machine w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.finsframework_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{id} or ins.fid=#{id} or ins.fparent=#{id})

select SUM(fdyne) FROM tb_welded_junction where 1=1
${str}
SELECT fid,fname from tb_insframework where ftype=21

SELECT COUNT(distinct(fmachine_id)) loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime,ins.fparent fid FROM
tb_work
tb_standby
l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND ins.fparent = #{parent}
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime,ins.fparent

SELECT COUNT(distinct(fmachine_id)) loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime,ins.fid FROM
tb_work
tb_standby
l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND ins.fparent = #{parent}
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime,ins.fid

SELECT COUNT(distinct(fmachine_id)) loads,
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m' )
DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
weekofyear(fstarttime)
weldTime,i.fid FROM
tb_work
tb_standby
l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE 1=1
AND (i.fid = #{parent} or ins.fid = #{parent} or ins.fparent=#{parent})
and fstarttime >= #{dto.dtoTime1}
and fendtime <= #{dto.dtoTime2}
group by weldTime,i.fid

select rownum num,fwelder_id,fjunction_id,timestampdiff(SECOND,weldtime,weldtimes) sum1,weldtime,felectricity,fmax_electricity,fmin_electricity from ( select * from (select *,rownum+1 nums from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum,A.* from ( SELECT case when felectricity > fmax_electricity then 1 when felectricity < fmin_electricity then 1 else 0 end as overproof,felectricity,fmax_electricity,fmin_electricity, DATE_FORMAT( fweldtime, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s' ) weldtime,fwelder_id,fjunction_id,(select @rownum:=0) r1 FROM ( select felectricity,fjunction_id,fweldtime,fwelder_id from tb_live_data where fstatus = 3 and fweldtime >= #{time} and fweldtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time},interval -1 day),interval 0 minute)) as k0 inner join tb_welded_junction j on j.fwelded_junction_no=k0.fjunction_id inner join tb_welder w on w.fwelder_no = k0.fwelder_id where fwelder_id=#{welder} and fjunction_id=#{junction} group by weldtime) A where overproof=1 order by weldtime) E)F inner join ( select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 num,B.* from( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( fweldtime, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s' ) weldtimes,( select @rownum:=0) r2,case when felectricity > fmax_electricity then 1 when felectricity < fmin_electricity then 1 else 0 end as overproofs FROM ( select felectricity,fjunction_id,fweldtime,fwelder_id from tb_live_data where fstatus = 3 and fweldtime >= #{time} and fweldtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time},interval -1 day),interval 0 minute)) as k0 inner join tb_welded_junction j on j.fwelded_junction_no=k0.fjunction_id inner join tb_welder w on w.fwelder_no = k0.fwelder_id where fwelder_id=#{welder} and fjunction_id=#{junction} group by weldtimes )B where overproofs=1 order by weldtimes)C where num>1 )D on F.nums = D.num)temp

SELECT g.fid fjunction_id,fgather_no iname,w.fid fmachine_id,fequipment_no wname FROM tb_welding_machine w INNER JOIN tb_gather g ON g.FMACHINE_ID = w.fid UNION SELECT g.fid fjunction_id,g.fgather_no iname,null fmachine_id,null wname FROM tb_gather g WHERE g.FMACHINE_ID is null
